resources.string: LOG IN TO YOUR FOGBUGZ ACCOUNT

You can do so by displaying an "About" or "Licenses" screen in your app that links back to this GitHub
Bugzy is an Open Source (Unofficial) android client for Fogbugz made by folks at BlueStacks.\nIt uses Fogbugz APIs documented here https://api.manuscript.com
